segments.text: My attention is drawn to the two children over by the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on a stool, and it looks incredibly wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching way up into a cookie jar, with a plate in his other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands nearby, with her hand out, clearly waiting for a share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite a daring little operation they've got going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at their mischievous teamwork.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: However, that stool looks so unstable, it makes me fearful he might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem utterly absorbed in their quest for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The anticipation on the girl's face is absolutely priceless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's remarkable how stealthily they are moving.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so close to getting their forbidden treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole secret mission is quite thrilling to observe.
segments.speaker: PAR
